text: “But someday I’m going to find somebody and love him and love him and never let him go.”
“The more I threw away, the more I found.”
“Everything has changed and yet, I am more me than I’ve ever been.”
“It is a frightening thought, that in one fraction of a moment you can fall in the kind of love that takes a lifetime to get over.”
“I’m tired. Tired today, tired tomorrow. I was tired yesterday and am tired today.”
“Loneliness: there is no organ that can take it all.”
"She wanted to lose herself in the words, in other times and places."
“The most selfless thing I’ve ever done was fight the urge to ask you to stay.”
"There are a million important things to do. But none as important as lying here next to you."
“Sometimes I feel so lost. Sometimes.”
“Memories are dangerous things. You turn them over and over, until you know every touch and corner, still, you’ll find an edge to cut you.”
“Don’t cling to things because everything is impermanent.”
“I am a collection of dismantled almosts.”
“I wanted someone to love who would stay: stay and be there, always.”
“My life is a struggle between my need for acceptance, my fear of rejection, and a desire to not care at all.”
“To me, home was never a place; it was a feeling. It was the way the people I loved said my name.”
“Your mother did not raise you with a wolf in your chest so you could howl over losing a man.”
“If you have ever lost someone very important to you, then you already know how it feels; if you haven’t, you cannot possibly imagine it.”
“Never apologize for burning too brightly or collapsing into yourself every night. That is how galaxies are made.”
“Nothing can wear you out like caring about people.”
“Lost is a lovely place to find yourself.”
“Home isn’t a place, it’s a feeling.”
“I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions.”
“Just in case you ever foolishly forget; I’m never not thinking of you.”
“But someday I’m going to find somebody and love him and love him and never let him go.”
“I asked her if she believed in love, and she smiled and said it was her most elaborate method of self-harm."
"I am the sea and nobody owns me."
“Nobody looks good in their darkest hours. But it’s those hours that make us what we are.”
“Whatever you do, never run back to what broke you.”
“I need a life that isn’t just about needing to escape my life.”
“I never fall apart, because I never fall together.”
“I’m tired. Tired today, tired tomorrow. I was tired yesterday and am tired today.”
"I do not understand why you would go out of your way to hurt each other, when life can already hurt so much."
“I want you always to remember me. Will you remember that I existed, and that I stood next to you here like this?”
“How stupid of me; to think I was the only flower in your garden.”
“Sometimes people have nothing to say because they’re too empty and sometimes people have nothing to say because they’re too full.”

"Don’t lose yourself just because you found somebody.”
"It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill."
“I have so much of you in my heart.”

“Look at you. I see what you have become and I’m glad I gave you up.”
“I only write when I am falling in love, or falling apart.”
“Memories do not always soften with time; some grow edges like knives.”
“It’s the ones you love the most who can lift you in an instant, and destroy you without trying.”
"She put me back together so well that I forgot I was broken."
“You never really see how toxic someone is until you breathe fresher air.”
“Eventually soulmates meet, for they have the same hiding place.”
“You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.”
"And what still shocks me, is how often the thing that hurts you, looks like the thing that helps you."
"I think of you so often you have no idea."
“We kissed a lot but it didn’t feel like love.”
“I think no matter how much time passes by, I will always have a weak spot for you. And that terrifies the hell out of me.”
“We get attached to temporary things, then wonder why our happiness never lasts.”
“I ruined myself for a lot of people that werent even worth it.”
“If you’re happy in a dream…does that count? The happiness–does it count?”
“I said it was okay, but really, you were tearing my fucking heart to shreds.”
“I wanted to kill myself and you were yelling about dirty dishes”
“No, I’m not ok. But I haven’t been ok since I was 11, maybe 12. I am still here though. ⁰I’m still breathing. That will have to be enough.”
“If you’re going to walk out of my life, I ask one thing of you. Once you’re gone and you see that I’m doing fine, don’t you dare come back”
“I want to admire someone else’s beauty without questioning my own”
“I don’t know what I need but I know something’s missing.”
“I think part of the reason why we hold so tight is because we fear something so great won’t happen twice”

“You’re like the rain… an old friend, with bad timing.”
“I made myself from all the love you no longer wanted.”
“It is a frightening thought, that in one fraction of a moment you can fall in the kind of love that takes a lifetime to get over.”

“You are not free until you have no need to impress anybody.”
“I’m the crazy one who thinks that words reach people.”

“…But our ears are too small for our hearts to understand the words inside.”
“I don’t want a lukewarm love. I want it to burn my lips and engulf my soul.”
"That’s why love is madness. It’s too easy to lose your mind when you lose your heart."
“Sometimes the most ordinary things can be made extraordinary by doing them with the right people.”

“I hate being so emotionally slutty. I need to stop loving everyone I have a long conversation with.”
"Write her a letter, send her a flower, love only gets old if you let it."
"I know I have a heart because I feel it breaking."
“The world will knock you down plenty. You don’t need to be doing it to yourself.”
“Don’t set yourself on fire to keep others warm.”
"I think of you so often you have no idea."
“I regret opening up to some people; they didn’t deserve to know me like that.”
“There’s a beautiful thing that happens inside you when you care about someone.”
“Be good to people. Even the shitty ones. Let the assholes be assholes. You’ll sleep better.”
Try to see the good in everyone.
“I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.”
"And what still shocks me, is how often the thing that hurts you, looks like the thing that helps you."
“The quieter you become, the more you can hear.”
"And strum my fingers gently across your skin, like I was playing the slowest love song in the world and only you and I could hear it."
“I don’t want to remind you of anyone. I want to be the first me you’ve ever met."
“If you show me you don’t give a fuck, I’ll show you that I’m better at it.”
“I want to meet people with fire in them, burning through life like a forest fire, too many people die out and survive on embers.”
“If you have ever lost someone very important to you, then you already know how it feels; if you haven’t, you cannot possibly imagine it.”
“I really don’t know what ‘I love you’ means. I think it means ‘Don’t leave me here alone.’”
“The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.”
“So plant your own gardens and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.”
“Some days I miss you so much I’d jump off the roof of your office building just to catch a glimpse of you on the way down.”
“I hope you look for me in everyone you meet.”
“Be silly. Be honest. Be kind.”
"I don’t chase people anymore. I learned that I’m here, and I’m important. I’m not going to run after people to prove that I matter."
“Do not feel lonely, the entire universe is inside you.”
“One of the best feelings in the world is knowing that your presence and absence both mean something to someone.”
“No matter how honestly you open up to someone, there are still things you cannot reveal.”
“And even if you’re not here to stay, I’m happy the universe allowed your soul to stop by.”
“I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.”
“I’m ashamed of myself because I know I should be better and I have no idea how to get there.”
“I thought I was your destination. Looks like I was just another stop on the line.”
“Don’t kiss me if you’re afraid of thunder. My life is a storm.”
“It is a frightening thought, that in one fraction of a moment you can fall in the kind of love that takes a lifetime to get over.”
“Sometimes suffering is just suffering. It doesn’t make you stronger. It doesn’t build character. It only hurts.”
“I don’t want to be a sweetheart. I want to be the fucking love of your life.”
“I can’t really articulate what I feel.”
“Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which they never show to anybody.”
“If anyone else were to kiss me, all they would taste is your name.”
“I am a collection of dismantled almosts.”
“I’m completely terrified of being like this for the rest of my life.”
“I poured everything I had into you, and you were still empty.”
“I do not sleep. I half-exist.”
“But someday I’m going to find somebody and love him and love him and never let him go.”
“Note to self: “I love you” does not mean “I won’t ever leave you.”
“I knew the second I met you that there was something about you I needed. Turns out it wasn’t something about you at all. It was just you.”
“The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise.”
"The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself."
"The only reason I hate you now is because I loved you then."
“I just want to pour my soul out on someone and not have to worry about the mess I’ve made. ”
“I will always love the false image I had of you.”
“These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.”
“I’m so good at beginnings, but in the end I always seem to destroy everything, including myself.”
“…Sometimes you don’t have to be mean to hurt someone.”
“Memories are dangerous things. You turn them over and over, until you know every touch and corner, still, you’ll find an edge to cut you.”
“I understand that nobody understands me, but I can’t be someone I’m not.”
"I want to go home. The hard part is, I haven’t figured out where home is."
“I hid my deepest feelings so well I forgot where I placed them.”
“I want you always to remember me. Will you remember that I existed, and that I stood next to you here like this?”
“Some people are so broken, they get mad at you for being whole.”
“You have my whole heart. You always did.”
"And if love moves like air, then teach me how to dig my nails into the palm of my hand so I can remember what you once felt like."
“Still, being able to feel pain was good, he thought. It’s when you can’t even feel pain anymore that you’re in real trouble.”
“…I want enough time to be in love with everything.”
“What made you happy once might not make you happy now.”
“We kissed a lot but it didn’t feel like love.”
“Marry someone you want to annoy for the rest of your life.”
"Sometimes I touch the things you used to touch, looking for echoes of your fingers."
“I only write when I am falling in love, or falling apart.”
"You are not weak just because your heart feels so heavy."
“Find me now. Before someone else does.”
"I still remember the person I once was and I really miss me.”
"If I could touch you as hard as I looked at you, there’d be indents in your skin in all the places where my eyes fell."
“You care and that’s what kills you.”
“I am jealous of everything that touches you. ⁰Even the sky holds your hand differently.”
“Be the person you needed when you were younger.”
“My nightmares are usually about losing you. I’m okay once I realize you’re here.”
“And I still wonder, how someone can feel so lonely while loving and being loved.”
“I think a lot of art is trying to make someone love you.”
"Psychology says, always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that’s the one that is going to help you grow”
"Act like you trust people, but don’t.”
“I don’t need anyone who doesn’t need me.”
“But how do you say goodbye when your heart still wants to hold on?”
"They listen more when you speak less.”
“One day it just gets better. There’s no explanation or reason why. You just wake up and you’re not angry anymore.”
“You need to keep moving on, darling, or you’ll miss the train to bigger things in life than this.”
“Getting over someone who meant the world to you is probably one of the most toughtest things a person will ever have to do.”
“Tell me then, does love make one a fool or do only fools fall in love?”
“I wonder how many people don’t get the one they want, but end up with the one they’re supposed to be with.”
“Someone, somewhere, can you understand me a little, love me a little? For all my despair, for all my ideals — I love life. But it is hard…”
“In ten minutes things could look so differently, like the colour of a sunset and the world after meeting you.”
“You’d take him back in a heartbeat if he asked you to. And that’s the fucking problem. That’s what keeps you from moving on.”
“Making mistakes is a lot better than not doing anything.”
“When someone won’t let you in, eventually you stop knocking.”
“Your entire universe is in your mind and nowhere else. To expand the universe, expand your mind.”
“Talk with people who make you see the world differently.”
“It’s better to have nobody than someone who is half there, or who doesn’t want to be there.”
“If you’re giving your all and it’s not enough, you’re probably giving it to the wrong person.”
“Be kind, be honest, be loving, be true and all of these things will come back to you.”
“Never let anyone take away your happiness.”
“Just because it pops into your head doesn’t mean it should come out of your mouth.”
“Don’t rush and never settle. If it’s meant to be, it will be.”
“Always be kinder than you feel.”
“We are all broken, that’s how the light gets in.”
a lot of the problems in the world would disappear if people would talk to each other instead of about each other
“It’s not that I hate people. I just feel better when they’re not around.”
“If we are the same person before and after we love, that means we haven’t loved enough.”
“I know people come and go but it still hurts when they do.”
“I just think we met at the wrong time Maybe even on the wrong day Or year.”
“Some people will never fit into your life, no matter how much you want them to.”
“I literally have to remind myself all the time, that being afraid of things going wrong isn’t the way to make things go right.”
“Be the person that you want to be around.”
“Don’t take your frustrations out on your partner. They should be the one person you can go to and feel at peace.”
“I don’t have friends. But I act like one for some people."
“What I don’t understand is how a person can tell you so many lies and never feel bad about it.”
“The eyes see only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.”
“Please don’t be temporary"
“I notice everything, I notice when people lose interest in me and it hurts so fucking bad.”
“When I met you, flowers started growing in the darkest parts of my mind.”
“I’ve tasted love and I’ve tasted sin and in the end they both are just as bitter.”
“Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.”
